00040 class ufs_request_base : public request
00041 {
00042     friend class ufs_file_base;
00043 protected:
00044     // states of request
00045     enum { OP = 0, DONE = 1, READY2DIE = 2 };                   // OP - operating, DONE - request served,
00046     // READY2DIE - can be destroyed
00047     /*
00048        ufs_file_base *file;
00049        void *buffer;
00050        stxxl::int64 offset;
00051        size_t bytes;
00052        request_type type;
00053      */
00054 
00055     state _state;
00056 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00057     boost::mutex waiters_mutex;
00058 #else
00059     mutex waiters_mutex;
00060 #endif
00061     std::set < onoff_switch * > waiters;

00071     void delete_waiter (onoff_switch * sw);
